text: Sophia D. King (born February 14, 1966) is an American politician. In 2016, she became a member of Chicago City Council. She is a member and chair of the City Council's Progressive Reform Caucus. In August 2022, King announced she would be running for Mayor of Chicago in the 2023 election. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago City Council members Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Colorado
title: Sophia King
